title: Flame Trap
summaries: The Flame Trap is a mechanism found naturally in the Jungle Temple. When activated, it fires a jet of fire, which has a range of 20 ([img:Nintendo 3DS version] 47) blocks (slightly less than the Flamethrower), and can pierce an infinite number of enemies. It has a cooldown of 3.33 seconds / 3 seconds between firings and deals about 80 damage to players and 40 to enemies.
Although naturally-generated Flame Traps are always found in the horizontal orientation, players can rotate them 90° using a hammer.
